subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Hunger, athleticism and opportunism paid off Sunday as Paolo Guerrero scored in the 69th minute to give Corinthians a 1-0 victory over Chelsea in the final of the Club World Cup.
snippet: Hunger, athleticism and opportunism paid off Sunday as Paolo Guerrero scored in the 69th minute to give Corinthians a 1-0 victory over Chelsea in the final of the Club World Cup.
